column4: can someone point me to a guide to creating a bootable usb stick for ubuntu 10.04 64 bit? Neither unetbootin or the usb-creator (running on Arch Linux) seems to create a bootable stick.
Are you sure your computer can boot from usb?
yeah, that's how I installed Arch in the first place
want a protip? Make sure you didn't disable USB boot in the BIOS :)
